attributes.action: Review qual criteria. Scrap fees for citizenship app from Fijian Service leavers
attributes.additional_details: These service persons put their lives on the line for every civilian in the UK. We owe them the respect and gratitude they deserve. They have made this country their home, where they have their friends and loved ones, who they will may have to leave behind. Thank you for your consideration.
attributes.background: British Armed Forces recruit from Fiji and other Commonwealth countries. They must serve four years to have the right to remain in the UK. Please review. Most can't afford the application fees. Please review. A support body needs to be established to inform and assist these Service Leavers
